entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 11:44 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing before morning. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 9:10 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
